# msgraph Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    msgraph = {
      source = "99-lives/msgraph"
    }
  }
}

provider "msgraph" {
  # example configuration here
}

data "msgraph_site" "site" {
	id = "msgraphtf.sharepoint.com:/sites/DataSite"
	//user_principal_name = "AdeleV@msgraphtf.onmicrosoft.com"
}

output "my_data" {
	value = data.msgraph_site.site
}
```
